config.description: The size to request when dynamically creating the volume
config.label: Default Storage Size

config.description: The storage class to use when dynamically creating the volume. If left blank the clusters default Storage Class will be used.
config.label: Storage Class Name

config.description: The access mode to use when dynamically creating the volume.
config.label: Storage Access Mode

description: Define how the system utilizes and interacts with storage.
